text: Viveca Lärn (born Viveca Sundvall, 6 April 1944 in Örgryte Parish, Gothenburg, Sweden) is a Swedish writerSundvall, Viveca, författare. Partille i Vem är det: svensk biografisk handbok. 1993, page. 1054. and journalist. She is mostly famous for writing the Mimmi and Eddie children's books series. She has also written books for adults. Her books for adults have led to the TV series Saltön. == References == ==Other websites== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish children's writers
title: Viveca Lärn
